body:
Similar but different to #22458. The build fails in depends while building libdmg-hfsplus:
```bash
time BASE_CACHE="/base_cache" SOURCES_PATH="/sources" SDK_PATH="/SDKs" HOSTS="arm64-apple-darwin" ./contrib/guix/guix-build
< snipped >
```
